<script>
'use strict';

(function apbOnErrorOverride () {
    
    var MSG_FILTERS = [ 
            
            [/^\s*Script error?.\s*$/, 'b-script-error'],

            
            [/\w+\salready registered/, 'b-already-registered-error'],

            
            [/\s*SyntaxError: Identifier 'opts' has already been declared\s*/, 'b-opts-redeclared-error'],
            
            [/\s*SyntaxError: redeclaration of const opts\s*/, 'b-opts-redeclared-error']
        ],

        FILE_FILTERS = [ 
            
        ],

        USER_AGENT_FILTERS = [ 
            
        ];
    var original = window.onerror || function () {};
    function check (value, filters) {
        var i = 0, rx, counter;
        for (; i < filters.length; i++) {
            rx = filters[i][0];
            counter = filters[i][1];
            if (rx.test(value)) {
                ue.count(counter, (ue.count(counter) || 0) + 1);
                return true;
            }
        }
        return false;
    }
    
    function apbOnErrorWrapper (message, file, line, col, error) {
        try {
            if (ue && ue.count) { 
                
                if (check(message, MSG_FILTERS)) return;
                if (check(file, FILE_FILTERS)) return;
                if (check(navigator.userAgent, USER_AGENT_FILTERS)) return;
            }
        } catch (err) {}
        
        original.call(this, message, file, line, col, error);
    }
    
    apbOnErrorWrapper.skipTrace = 1;
    window.onerror = apbOnErrorWrapper;
}());
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var hmenu = document.getElementById("nav-hamburger-menu");
  hmenu.setAttribute("href", "javascript: void(0)");
  window.navHamburgerMetricLogger = function() {
    if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
      var metricName = "Nav:Hmenu:IconClickActionPending";
      window.ue.count(metricName, (ue.count(metricName) || 0) + 1);
    }
    window.$Nav && $Nav.declare("navHMenuIconClicked",!0);
    window.$Nav && $Nav.declare("navHMenuIconClickedNotReadyTimeStamp", Date.now());
  };
  hmenu.addEventListener("click", window.navHamburgerMetricLogger);
  window.$Nav && $Nav.declare('hamburgerMenuIconAvailableOnLoad', false);
</script>

      <script type='text/javascript'>window.navmet.tmp=+new Date();</script>

<div id='nav-subnav'  data-category="automotive">
  <a href="/Car-Motorbike-Store/b/?ie=UTF8&node=4772060031&ref_=topnav_storetab_automotivesubnav" class="nav-a nav-b"

<script type='text/javascript'>window.navmet.push({key:'Subnav',end:+new Date(),begin:window.navmet.tmp});</script>
    </div>

    <div id='nav-flyout-ewc' class='nav-ewc-lazy-align nav-ewc-hide-head'><div class='nav-flyout-body ewc-beacon' tabindex='-1'><div class='nav-ewc-arrow'></div><div class='nav-ewc-content'></div></div></div><script type='text/javascript'>
(function() {
  var viewportWidth = function() {
    return window.innerWidth ||
      document.documentElement.clientWidth ||
      document.body.clientWidth;
  };

  if (typeof uet === 'function') {  uet('x1', 'ewc', {wb: 1}); }

  window.$Nav && $Nav.declare('config.ewc', (function() {
    var config = {"enablePersistent":true,"viewportWidthForPersistent":1400,"isEWCLogging":1,"isEWCStateExpanded":true,"EWCStateReason":"fixed","isSmallScreenEnabled":true,"isFreshCustomer":false,"errorContent":{"html":"<div class='nav-ewc-error'><span class='nav-title'>Oops!</span><p class='nav-paragraph'>There is a problem loading your cart right now</p><a href='/gp/cart/view.html?ref_=nav_err_ewc_timeout' class='nav-action-button'><span class='nav-action-inner'>Your Cart</span></a></div>"},"url":"/cart/ewc/compact?hostPageType=Landing&hostSubPageType=BrowsePage&hostPageRID=JQE10MWZR9097BQKZGE8&prerender=0&storeName=automotive","cartCount":0,"freshCartCount":0,"almCartCount":0,"primeWardrobeCartCount":0,"isCompactViewEnabled":true,"isCompactEWCRendered":true,"isWiderCompactEWCRendered":true,"EWCBrowserCacheKey":"EWC_Cache_000-0000000-0000000__INR_en_IN","isContentRepainted":false,"clearCache":false,"loadFromCacheWithDelay":0,"delayRenderingTillATF":false};
    var hasAui = window.P && window.P.AUI_BUILD_DATE;
    var isRTLEnabled = (document.dir === 'rtl');
    config.pinnable = config.pinnable && hasAui;
    config.isMigrationTreatment = true;

    config.flyout = (function() {
      var navbelt = document.getElementById('nav-belt');
      var navCart = document.getElementById('nav-cart');
      var ewcFlyout = document.getElementById('nav-flyout-ewc');
      var persistentClassOnBody = 'nav-ewc-persistent-hover nav-ewc-full-height-persistent-hover';
      var flyout = {};

      var getDocumentScrollTop = function() {
        return (document.documentElement && document.documentElement.scrollTop) || document.body.scrollTop;
      };

      var isWindow = function(obj) {
        return obj != null && obj === obj.window;
      };

      var getWindow = function(elem) {
        return isWindow(elem) ? elem : elem.nodeType === 9 && elem.defaultView;
      };

      var getOffset = function(elem) {
        if (elem.getClientRects && !elem.getClientRects().length) {
          return {top: 0};
        }

        var rect = elem.getBoundingClientRect
          ? elem.getBoundingClientRect()
          : {top: 0};

        if (rect.width || rect.height) {
          var doc = elem.ownerDocument;
          var win = getWindow(doc);
          return {
            top: rect.top + win.pageYOffset - doc.documentElement.clientTop
          };
        }
        return rect;
      };

      flyout.align = function() {
        var newTop = getOffset(navbelt).top - getDocumentScrollTop();
        ewcFlyout.style.top = (newTop > 0 ? newTop + 'px' : 0);
      };

      flyout.hide = function() {
        isRTLEnabled
          ? (ewcFlyout.style.left = '')
          : (ewcFlyout.style.right = '');
      };

      if(typeof config.isCompactEWCRendered === 'undefined') {
        if (
          (config.isSmallScreenEnabled && viewportWidth() < 1400) ||
          (config.isCompactViewEnabled && viewportWidth() >= 1400)
        ) {
          config.isCompactEWCRendered = true;
          config.isEWCStateExpanded = true;
          config.url = config.url.replace("/gp/navcart/sidebar", "/cart/ewc/compact");
        } else {
          config.isCompactEWCRendered = false;
        }
      }

      var viewportQualifyForPersistent = function () {
        return (config.isCompactEWCRendered)
          ? true
          : viewportWidth() >= 1400;
      }

      flyout.hasQualifiedViewportForPersistent = viewportQualifyForPersistent;

      var getEWCRightOffset = function() {
        if (!config.isCompactEWCRendered) {
          return 0;
        }

        var $navbelt = document.getElementById('nav-belt');
        if ($navbelt === undefined || $navbelt === null) {
          return 0;
        }

        var EWCCompactViewWidth = (config.isWiderCompactEWCRendered  && viewportWidth() >= 1280) ? 130 : 100;
        var scrollLeft = (window.pageXOffset !== undefined)
          ? window.pageXOffset
          : (document.documentElement || document.body.parentNode || document.body).scrollLeft;
        var scrollXAxis = Math.abs(scrollLeft);
        var windowWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        var navbeltWidth = $navbelt.offsetWidth;
        var isPartOfNavbarNotVisible = (navbeltWidth + EWCCompactViewWidth) > windowWidth;

        if (isPartOfNavbarNotVisible) {
          return 0 - (navbeltWidth - scrollXAxis - windowWidth + EWCCompactViewWidth);
        } else {
          return 0;
        }
      }

      flyout.getEWCRightOffsetCssProperty = function () {
        return getEWCRightOffset() + 'px';
      }

      if (config.isCompactEWCRendered) {
        persistentClassOnBody = 'nav-ewc-persistent-hover nav-ewc-compact-view';
        if (config.isWiderCompactEWCRendered) { persistentClassOnBody += ' nav-ewc-wider-compact-view'; }
      }

      flyout.show = function() {
        isRTLEnabled
          ? (ewcFlyout.style.left = flyout.getEWCRightOffsetCssProperty())
          : (ewcFlyout.style.right = flyout.getEWCRightOffsetCssProperty());
      };

      var isIOSDevice = function() {
        return (/iPad|iPhone|iPod/.test(navigator.platform) ||
                (navigator.platform === 'MacIntel' && navigator.maxTouchPoints > 1)) &&
                !window.MSStream;
      }

      var checkForPersistent = function() {
        if (!hasAui) {
          return { result: false, reason: 'noAui' };
        }
        if (!config.enablePersistent) {
          return { result: false, reason: 'config' };
        }
        if (!viewportQualifyForPersistent()) {
          return { result: false, reason: 'viewport' };
        }
        if (isIOSDevice()) {
          return { result: false, reason: 'iOS' };
        }
        if (!config.cartCount > 0) {
          return { result: false, reason: 'emptycart' };
        }
        return { result: true };
      };

      flyout.ableToPersist = function() {
        return checkForPersistent().result;
      };
      var persistentClassRegExp = '(?:^|\\s)' + persistentClassOnBody + '(?!\\S)';
      flyout.applyPageLayoutForPersistent = function() {
        if (!document.documentElement.className.match( new RegExp(persistentClassRegExp) )) {
          document.documentElement.className += ' ' + persistentClassOnBody;
        }
      };

      flyout.unapplyPageLayoutForPersistent = function() {
        document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace( new RegExp(persistentClassRegExp, 'g'), '');
      };

      flyout.persist = function() {
        flyout.applyPageLayoutForPersistent();
        flyout.show();
        if (config.isCompactEWCRendered) {
          flyout.align();
        }
      };

      flyout.unpersist = function() {
        flyout.unapplyPageLayoutForPersistent();
        flyout.hide();
      };
      
      var persistentCheck = checkForPersistent();
    

      var resizeCallback = function() {
        
        if (flyout.ableToPersist()) {
          flyout.persist();
        }
        else {
          flyout.unpersist();
        }
      };

      flyout.bindEvents = function() {
        if (window.addEventListener) {
          window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCallback, false);
          
          if (config.isCompactEWCRendered) {
            window.addEventListener('scroll', flyout.align, false);
          }
        }
      };

      flyout.unbindEvents = function() {
        if (window.removeEventListener) {
          window.removeEventListener('resize', resizeCallback, false);
          
          if (config.isCompactEWCRendered) {
            window.removeEventListener('scroll', flyout.align, false);
          }
        }
      };
      
      var ewcDefaultPersistence = function() {
      
        if (persistentCheck.result) {
          flyout.persist();
          if (window.ue && ue.tag) {
            ue.tag('ewc:persist');
          }
        } else {
          if (window.ue && ue.tag) {
            ue.tag('ewc:unpersist');
            if (persistentCheck.reason === 'noAui') {
              ue.tag('ewc:unpersist:noAui');
            }
            if (persistentCheck.reason === 'viewport') {
              ue.tag('ewc:unpersist:viewport');
            }
            if (persistentCheck.reason === 'emptycart') {
              ue.tag('ewc:unpersist:emptycart');
            }
            if (persistentCheck.reason === 'iOS') {
              ue.tag('ewc:unpersist:iOS');
            }
          }
        }
      };
      
      ewcDefaultPersistence();
      
      if (window.ue && ue.tag)  {
        if (flyout.hasQualifiedViewportForPersistent()) {
          ue.tag('ewc:bview');
        }
        else {
          ue.tag('ewc:sview');
        }
      }
      flyout.bindEvents();
      flyout.cache = function () {
    const cache = window.sessionStorage;
    const CACHE_KEY = "EWCBrowserCacheKey";
    const CACHE_EXPIRY = "EWCBrowserCacheExpiry"; 
    const CACHE_VALUE = "EWCBrowserCacheValue"; 
    const isSessionStorageValid = function () {
        return window && cache && cache instanceof Storage;
    };
    const isCachePresent = function (key) {
        return cache.length > 0 && cache.getItem(key);
    }
    const isValidType = function (value) {
        // Prevents accessing empty key-value and internal methods(prototypes) of storage
        // TODO: Log metrics for invalid access;
        return value && value.constructor == String;
    }
    return {
        getCache: function (key) {
            const value = isCachePresent(key);
            return (isValidType(value)) ? value : null;
        },
        setCache: function (key, value) {
            const oldValue = isCachePresent(key);
            const cacheExpiryTime = isCachePresent(CACHE_EXPIRY);
            // Set the expiry when there's no existing cache - to prevent resetting expiry on page navigation
            if (!cacheExpiryTime) {
                var currentTime = new Date();
                cache.setItem(CACHE_EXPIRY, new Date(currentTime.getTime() + 5 * 60000))
            }
            // TODO: Log length of old and new cache values when logMetrics is true
            cache.setItem(key, value);
        },
        updateCacheAndEwcContainer: function (cacheKey, newEwcContent) {
            const $ = $Nav.getNow("$");
            const $currentEwc = $("#ewc-content");
            if (!$currentEwc.length) {
                var $content = $('#nav-flyout-ewc .nav-ewc-content');
                $content.html(newEwcContent);
                this.setCache(CACHE_KEY, cacheKey);
                if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
                    var current = window.ue.count("ewc-init-cache") || 0;
                    window.ue.count("ewc-init-cache", current + 1);
                }
            } else {
                var $newEwcContent = $('<div />');
                var EWC_CONTENT_BODY_SCROLL_SELECTOR = ".ewc-scroller--selected";
                if (newEwcContent) { // 1. Updates EWC container with new HTML 
        var domParser = new DOMParser();
               var sandboxedEwcContent = domParser.parseFromString(newEwcContent, 'text/html');
               var newEwcHtmlNoScript = sandboxedEwcContent.getElementById('ewc-content');
               const $newEwcHtml = $newEwcContent.html(newEwcHtmlNoScript);
                    const offSet = $currentEwc.find(EWC_CONTENT_BODY_SCROLL_SELECTOR).position().top - $currentEwc.find(".ewc-active-cart--selected").position().top;
                    $currentEwc.html($newEwcHtml.html());
                    $currentEwc.find(EWC_CONTENT_BODY_SCROLL_SELECTOR).scrollTop(offSet);
                    if (typeof window.uex === 'function') {
                        window.uex('ld', 'ewc-reflect-new-state', {wb: 1});
                    }
                } else {
                    // 2. Fetches cached response and updates it's html with new state on EWC Update
                    const cachedEwc = this.getCache(CACHE_VALUE);
                    $newEwcContent = $newEwcContent[0];
                    $(cachedEwc).map(function (elementIndex, element) {
                         $newEwcContent.appendChild((element.id === "ewc-content") ? $currentEwc.clone()[0] : element);
                    });
                    newEwcContent = $newEwcContent.innerHTML;
                    if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
                        var current = window.ue.count("ewc-update-cache") || 0;
                        window.ue.count("ewc-update-cache", current + 1);
                    }
                }
                $newEwcContent.remove();
            }
            this.setCache(CACHE_VALUE, newEwcContent);
        },
        removeCache: function (key) {
            return cache.removeItem(key);
        }
    }
}
;
      return flyout;
    }());
     
     
     
const CACHE_KEY = "EWCBrowserCacheKey";
const CACHE_VALUE = "EWCBrowserCacheValue"; 
const CACHE_EXPIRY = "EWCBrowserCacheExpiry"; 
var cache = config.flyout.cache();

const isCacheValid = function () {
  // Check for page types and tenure of the cache
  const clearCache = config.clearCache;
  const cacheExpiryTime = cache.getCache(CACHE_EXPIRY);
  const isCacheExpired = new Date() > new Date(cacheExpiryTime);
  const cacheKey = config.EWCBrowserCacheKey;
  const oldCacheKey = cache.getCache(CACHE_KEY);
  const isCacheValid = !clearCache && !isCacheExpired && cacheKey == oldCacheKey;
  if (!isCacheValid && window.ue && window.ue.count) {
    var current = window.ue.count("ewc-cache-invalidated") || 0;
    window.ue.count("ewc-cache-invalidated", current + 1);
  }
  return isCacheValid;
}
function loadFromCache() {
    if (window.uet && typeof window.uet === 'function') {
        window.uet('bb', 'ewc-loaded-from-cache', {wb: 1});
    }
    if (cache) {
        if (isCacheValid()) {
            var content = cache.getCache(CACHE_VALUE);
            if (content) {
                var $ewcContainer = document.getElementById("nav-flyout-ewc").getElementsByClassName("nav-ewc-content")[0];
                var $ewcContent = document.getElementById("ewc-content");
                if ($ewcContainer && !$ewcContent) {
                    $ewcContainer.innerHTML = content;
                    // Execute scripts from cache
                    const ewcJavascript = document.getElementById("ewc-content").parentNode.querySelectorAll(':scope > script');
                    ewcJavascript.forEach(function (script) {
                        var scriptTag = document.createElement("script");
                        scriptTag.innerHTML = script.innerHTML;
                        document.body.appendChild(scriptTag);
                    });
                    if (typeof window.uex === 'function') {
                        window.uex('ld', 'ewc-loaded-from-cache', {wb: 1});
                    }
                } else if (window.ue && window.ue.count && typeof window.ue.count === 'function') {
                    var currentFailure = window.ue.count("ewc-slow-cache") || 0;
                    window.ue.count("ewc-slow-cache", currentFailure + 1);
                }
            }
        } else {
            cache.removeCache(CACHE_VALUE);
            cache.removeCache(CACHE_KEY);
            cache.removeCache(CACHE_EXPIRY);
        }
    }
}
function delayBy(delayTime) {
    if (delayTime) {
        window.setTimeout(function() {
            loadFromCache();
        }, delayTime)
    } else {
        loadFromCache();
    }
}
if(config.delayRenderingTillATF) {
    (window.AmazonUIPageJS ? AmazonUIPageJS : P).when('atf').execute("EverywhereCartLoadFromCacheOnAtf", function () {
        delayBy(config.loadFromCacheWithDelay);
    });
} else {
    delayBy(config.loadFromCacheWithDelay);
}

    return config;
  }()));

  if (typeof uet === 'function') {
    uet('x2', 'ewc', {wb: 1});
  }

  if (window.ue && ue.tag) {
    ue.tag('ewc');
    ue.tag('ewc:unrec');
    ue.tag('ewc:cartsize:0');

    if ( window.P && window.P.AUI_BUILD_DATE ) {
      ue.tag('ewc:aui');
    } else {
      ue.tag('ewc:noAui');
    }
  }
}());
</script>
  </div>

  
  

</header>

  window.$Nav && $Nav.declare('config.flyoutURL', null);

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

        display: inline-block;
        padding-right: 10px;
        padding-left: 10px;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 2
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link.selected .octopus-sims-img-border, .octopus-sims-img-link.selected:hover .octopus-sims-img-border {
        background: #c45500
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link:hover .octopus-sims-img-border {
        background: #bbb
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-container {
        height: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        position: relative;
        background: #fff
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-border {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 8%;
        position: absolute;
        height: 4px;
        width: 84%;
        z-index: 2
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-img-border {
        left: auto;
        right: 8%;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-container:before {
        content: "";
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle;
        height: 100%
    }

    .octopus-sims-loading {
        height: 2px
    }

    .octopus-sims-loading img {
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%
    }

    .octopus-sims-details {
        overflow: hidden;
        height: 100%;
        margin-left: 10px
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-details {
        margin-right: 10px;
        margin-left: auto;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        vertical-align: middle
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: auto;
        right: 0;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .05)
    }

</style>

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>

                cardCssClass: 'octopus-best-seller-card'

    <a class="a-link-normal octopus-pc-item-link" title="Tyre Stone Remover Tool, Fapiwen Multipurpose Car Tire Stone Remover Hook, Tire Cleaning Hook, Tyre Stone Picker for Motor Bike Truck Car, Wheel Remover Stone Hook with Solid Rubber Handle" href="/Remover-Fapiwen-Multipurpose-Cleaning-Picker/dp/B0CHYHVRS6?ref_=Oct_d_omg_d_5257496031_1&amp;pd_rd_w=xyXT5&amp;content-id=amzn1.sym.b97a3d6e-5774-4a93-870a-19a7e2e63776&amp;pf_rd_p=b97a3d6e-5774-4a93-870a-19a7e2e63776&amp;pf_rd_r=JQE10MWZR9097BQKZGE8&amp;pd_rd_wg=3pcXb&amp;pd_rd_r=20e7ea9c-9454-4724-890a-ccdc3a4aa5f4&amp;pd_rd_i=B0CHYHVRS6">

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

        vertical-align: middle
    }

    #octopus-quick-look-asin-popover img.octopus-quick-look-product-image {
        max-width: 100%;
        max-height: 100%;
        width: auto;

    }

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>


<div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-octopus-quick-look-popover">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'table-adjustment-handler', 'ready').execute(function (A, $, TableAdjustmentHandler) {

        if (TableAdjustmentHandler) {
            new TableAdjustmentHandler({
                cardCssClass: 'octopus-best-seller-card'
            });
        }
    });

        A.loadHiResImage($('.octopus-best-seller-card .octopus-pc-item-image'));
    });

</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

        position: relative;
        z-index: 2
    }

    .octopus-sims-header-text {
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: block;
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link {
        display: inline-block;
        padding-right: 10px;
        padding-left: 10px;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 2
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link.selected .octopus-sims-img-border, .octopus-sims-img-link.selected:hover .octopus-sims-img-border {
        background: #c45500
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link:hover .octopus-sims-img-border {
        background: #bbb
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-container {
        height: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        position: relative;
        background: #fff
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-border {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 8%;
        position: absolute;
        height: 4px;
        width: 84%;
        z-index: 2
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-img-border {
        left: auto;
        right: 8%;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-container:before {
        content: "";
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle;
        height: 100%
    }

    .octopus-sims-loading {
        height: 2px
    }

    .octopus-sims-loading img {
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%
    }

    .octopus-sims-details {
        overflow: hidden;
        height: 100%;
        margin-left: 10px
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-details {
        margin-right: 10px;
        margin-left: auto;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        vertical-align: middle
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: auto;
        right: 0;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .05)
    }

</style>

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>


<div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-octopus-quick-look-popover">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'table-adjustment-handler', 'ready').execute(function (A, $, TableAdjustmentHandler) {

        if (TableAdjustmentHandler) {
            new TableAdjustmentHandler({
                cardCssClass: 'octopus-best-seller-card'
            });
        }
    });

    });

</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>


<div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-octopus-quick-look-popover">
    <div class="octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper">
        <div id="octopus-quick-look-asin-popover">
            <div class="octopus-quick-look-content">
                <a class="octopus-quick-look-imgblock">
                    <img alt="" src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._V192234675_.gif" class="octopus-quick-look-product-image"/>
                </a>
                <div class="octopus-quick-look-detailblock">
                    <div class="octopus-quick-look-details">
                        <span class="a-color-tertiary octopus-quick-look-byline"></span>
                        <span class="octopus-quick-look-title"></span>
                        <div class="octopus-quick-look-reviews">
                            <a class="octopus-quick-look-reviews-link">
                                <i class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-0 octopus-quick-look-reviewStars"></i>
                                <span class="a-color-tertiary octopus-quick-look-review-count"></span>
                            </a>
                        </div>
                        <div class="octopus-quick-look-pricing">
                            <span class="a-color-price octopus-quick-look-price"></span>
                            <span class="a-size-base a-color-tertiary octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label"></span>
                            <span class="a-size-base a-color-tertiary octopus-quick-look-strike-price a-text-strike"></span>
                            <div class="a-section a-spacing-none">
                                <span class="a-size-base a-color-base octopus-quick-look-points"></span>

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

    #octopus-quick-look-asin-popover .octopus-quick-look-content, #octopus-quick-look-asin-popover .octopus-quick-look-detailblock, .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper {
        height: 100%
    }

        z-index: 2
    }

        content: "";
        display: inline-block;
        height: 100%;
        vertical-align: middle
    }

        float: left;

    }

        float: right;

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>


<div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-octopus-quick-look-popover">
    <div class="octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper">

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'table-adjustment-handler', 'ready').execute(function (A, $, TableAdjustmentHandler) {

        if (TableAdjustmentHandler) {
            new TableAdjustmentHandler({
                cardCssClass: 'octopus-best-seller-card'
            });
        }
    });


    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'load').execute('asin-hi-res-image',function (A, $) {
        A.loadHiResImage($('.octopus-best-seller-card .octopus-pc-item-image'));
    });

</script>
