    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'ready').execute(function (A, $) {
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj || P.register('table-adjustment-handler', function () {

            var TableAdjustmentHandler = function (args) {

                this.cardCssClass = args.cardCssClass;
                
                this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH = 198;
                this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item-last';
                this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-item';
                this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS = 'octopus-pc-card-list';


                this.CONTAINER_BORDER_WIDTH = 2;

                this.init();
                return this;
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.init = function () {
                if($('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS).length > 0)
                {
                    this.adjustTableItemWidth();
                    this.bindAction();
                }
            };

            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.adjustTableItemWidth = function () {

                var items = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                var tableContainerInnerWidth = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_LIST_CSS_CLASS)[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;

                var colNum = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / this.ITEM_LIST_MIN_WIDTH);
                if (colNum > 0) {
                    var singleAsinWidth = Math.floor(tableContainerInnerWidth / colNum);
                    var columnBiggerOne = tableContainerInnerWidth % singleAsinWidth;
                    var index = 0;
                    A.map(items, function(value) {
                        index ++;
                        if (index <= columnBiggerOne) {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth + 1);
                        } else {
                            $(value).width(singleAsinWidth);
                        }
                    });
                }
                
                
                var lastItem = $('.' + this.cardCssClass + ' .' + this.ITEM_CSS_CLASS + ':eq(' + (colNum - 1) + ')');
                items.removeClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
                lastItem.addClass(this.LAST_ITEM_CSS_CLASS);
            };


            TableAdjustmentHandler.prototype.bindAction = function () {
                var context = this;

                A.on.resize(function () {
                    context.adjustTableItemWidth();
                });

            };
            return TableAdjustmentHandler;
        });
        window.registeredTableAdjustmentObj = true;
    });
</script>

        height: 2px;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative
    }

    .octopus-sims-wrapper.hidden {
        background: #fff
    }

    .octopus-sims-header {
        padding-top: 15px;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 2
    }

    .octopus-sims-header-text {
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: block;
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link {
        display: inline-block;
        padding-right: 10px;
        padding-left: 10px;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 2
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link.selected .octopus-sims-img-border, .octopus-sims-img-link.selected:hover .octopus-sims-img-border {
        background: #c45500
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-link:hover .octopus-sims-img-border {
        background: #bbb
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-container {
        height: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        position: relative;
        background: #fff
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-border {
        bottom: 0;
        left: 8%;
        position: absolute;
        height: 4px;
        width: 84%;
        z-index: 2
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-img-border {
        left: auto;
        right: 8%;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-container:before {
        content: "";
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle;
        height: 100%
    }

    .octopus-sims-loading {
        height: 2px
    }

    .octopus-sims-loading img {
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%
    }

    .octopus-sims-details {
        overflow: hidden;
        height: 100%;
        margin-left: 10px
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-details {
        margin-right: 10px;
        margin-left: auto;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
        height: 100%;
        width: 100%;
        vertical-align: middle
    }

    html[dir=rtl] .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        left: auto;
        right: 0;
    }

    .octopus-sims-img-overlay {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, .05)
    }

</style>

<script>
    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'a-modal').execute(function (A, $, popover) {
    if(!window.octopusQuickLookJsReady)
    {
        var asin;
        var marketplaceID;
        var requestId;
        var quickLookModal = popover.get($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"));
        A.declarative('octopus-quick-look', 'click', function (event) {
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
            asin = event.data.asin;
            marketplaceID = event.data.marketplaceID;
            requestId = event.data.requestId;
            var modalArgs = {
                'height': 590,
                'width': '90%',
                'max-width': '900',
                'min-width': '600',
                'hideHeader': true,
                'name': 'octopus-quick-look-popover'
            };
            if (!quickLookModal) {
                quickLookModal = popover.create($("#octopus-quick-look-btn"), modalArgs);

            } else {
                quickLookModal.update(modalArgs);
            }
            quickLookModal.show();
        });
        A.on('a:popover:afterShow:octopus-quick-look-popover', function (data) {
            $('.a-popover-inner .octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({
                'padding': '0px',
                'margin': '0px',
                'overflow': 'hidden',
                'height': ''
            });
            $('div.octopus-sims-details').html("");
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').addClass('hidden');
            $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': ''});
            A.ajax('/apb/page/content', {
                method: 'post',
                params: {
                    'handlerName': 'OctopusRecommendPurchase',
                    'asin': asin,
                    'marketplaceId': marketplaceID,
                    'requestId': requestId,
                    'ajaxCall' : 'true'
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    if (data.length > 10) {
                        $('div.octopus-sims-details').html(data);
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').css({'height': '100%'});
                        $('div.octopus-sims-loading').removeClass();
                        $('div.octopus-sims-wrapper').removeClass('hidden');
                        $('div.octopus-quick-look-popover-wrapper').parent().css({'height': '100%'});
                    }
                },
                error: function () {
                    console.info("Failed");
                }
            });
        });

        A.declarative('octopus-customer-also-bought-asin', 'click', function (event) {
            $('.octopus-sims-img-link').removeClass('selected');
            $('#octopus-sims-' + event.data.asin + '.octopus-sims-img-link').addClass('selected');
            changeAsinDetail(event.data);
        });

        function changeAsinDetail(data) {
            $('.octopus-quick-look-imgblock').attr('href', data.url);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-title').html(data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-byline').html(data.byLine);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('src', data.image);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-product-image').attr('alt', data.title);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').html(data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-price').attr('alt', data.price);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').attr('alt', data.reviewDisplayString);
            $('.octopus-quick-look-reviews-link').attr('href', data.url + '#customerReviews');

            
            if (!data.hasHalfStar && (!data.fullStarCount || data.fullStarCount == 0)) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
            } else {
                if (data.hasHalfStar) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount + '-5');
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').removeClass().addClass('a-icon a-icon-star octopus-quick-look-reviewStars');
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-reviewStars').addClass('a-star-' + data.fullStarCount);
                }
                if (data.reviewCount != null && data.reviewCount != '0') {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').html(data.reviewCount);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-review-count').empty();
                }
            }
            if (data.isPrime) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').show();
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-prime').hide();
            }

            if (data.showStrikeThroughPriceLabel) {
                if (data.strikePrice != null && data.strikeThroughPriceLabel != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').html(data.strikeThroughPriceLabel);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price-label').empty();
                }
            } else {
                if (data.strikePrice != null) {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').html(data.strikePrice);
                } else {
                    $('.octopus-quick-look-strike-price').empty();
                }
            }

            if (data.points != null) {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').html(data.points.pointsDisplayString);
            } else {
                $('.octopus-quick-look-points').empty();
            }

            $('#octopus-quick-look-detail-btn a').attr('href', data.url);
        }
    window.octopusQuickLookJsReady = true;
    }
    });
</script>


<div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-octopus-quick-look-popover">

    <script type="text/javascript">

    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'table-adjustment-handler', 'ready').execute(function (A, $, TableAdjustmentHandler) {

        if (TableAdjustmentHandler) {
            new TableAdjustmentHandler({
                cardCssClass: 'octopus-best-seller-card'
            });
        }
    });


    P.when('A', 'jQuery', 'load').execute('asin-hi-res-image',function (A, $) {
        A.loadHiResImage($('.octopus-best-seller-card .octopus-pc-item-image'));
    });

</script>

High Shine Finish" href="/Turtle-Wax-T217RA-Black-Ultra/dp/B0024D43YA?ref_=Oct_d_otopr_d_5257496031_1&amp;pd_rd_w=OWlrW&amp;content-id=amzn1.sym.25a1078a-aa23-4746-b8f2-37c5df5524ed&amp;pf_rd_p=25a1078a-aa23-4746-b8f2-37c5df5524ed&amp;pf_rd_r=JQE10MWZR9097BQKZGE8&amp;pd_rd_wg=3pcXb&amp;pd_rd_r=20e7ea9c-9454-4724-890a-ccdc3a4aa5f4&amp;pd_rd_i=B0024D43YA">
